answerText: San Manuel Bueno, martir [or Saint Manuel the Good, Martyr][10] Name the author of The Tragic Sense of Life and Niebla as well as San Manuel Bueno, martir.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 11 | 2 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Angela, the narrator of this work, explains that her mother's dying wish was for her non-believing brother, Lazarus, to pray. For 10 points each: [10] Name this work in which the title character pretends to be a devout Catholic in order to help his village. The title character becomes depressed and dies from his moral struggle, which his village sees as evidence of holiness.
